mapper.insert: insert into order (orderID, carID, cuID, postPName, postPTel, postPAddr, getPName, getPTeL, getPAddr, goodsName, goodsWeight, orderType, orderState, transportPrice, deliveryPrice, totalPrice, Comment) values (#{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsweight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update order set carID = #{carid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cuID = #{cuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postPName = #{postpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postPTel = #{postptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postPAddr = #{postpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPName = #{getpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPTeL = #{getptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPAddr = #{getpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsName = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsWeight = #{goodsweight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, orderType = #{ordertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderState = #{orderstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transportPrice = #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deliveryPrice = #{deliveryprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where orderID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select orderID, carID, cuID, postPName, postPTel, postPAddr, getPName, getPTeL, getPAddr, goodsName, goodsWeight, orderType, orderState, transportPrice, deliveryPrice, totalPrice, Comment from order where orderID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
